title: Virtual Receptionist for Boat Rental & Marina Business (Customer Service + Scheduling)
job_overview:
Part-time, Long-term (30–35 hours/week to start, may grow). Seasonal spike in call volume during summer months.

Pay: $6–$8 USD/hour, paid weekly

Hello!

We’re a family-owned boat rental and marina business in North Carolina, USA. We're looking for a warm, organized, and reliable Virtual Assistant to answer customer phone calls and texts, respond to inquiries, and help manage reservations.

???? Responsibilities:
- Answer incoming calls/texts (we use a business phone app called Podium that works internationally).
- Respond to customer questions about boat availability, pricing, and policies.
- Help manage our booking calendar (we’ll train you). We use a software called Fareharbor for boat rentals.
- Follow call scripts and update logs in our system.
- Report any customer concerns or issues promptly.
- Help with occasional admin work (e.g., basic follow-ups).

???? You Are:
- Friendly, clear, and professional on the phone. 
- Comfortable speaking and writing in fluent English.
- Detail-oriented and a strong note taker.
- Available during U.S. Eastern Time (9am–6pm EST preferred)
- Stable internet and quiet work environment

???? Tools We Use (we’ll train you):
- Fareharbor Booking Software
- Podium phone/text service 
- GPS tracking System for all our boat rentals

???? Bonus if you have:
- Experience in hospitality, reservations, or marina/boating industry
- Sales experience or upselling mindset (Company Culture= 'Get the Booking Always Mindset')
- Familiarity with U.S. culture, time zones, customer expectations

???? To apply, please send:
- A quick intro about yourself
- A short audio recording introducing yourself like you're answering the phone
- Your resume and relevant experience
- Your available work schedule in Eastern Time

We are looking for someone long-term who wants to grow with our business. If things go well with the boat rental business calls, we can expand your work to our other businesses in time. The boat rental is very seasonal, April-October. However, we are looking for someone who can come back every season for us.

If you're friendly, dependable, and excited to help people enjoy their time on the water—let’s talk!
